org.apache.oozie.store
Interface WorkflowStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBWorkflowStore
public interface WorkflowStore

WorkflowStore Interface to persist the Jobs and Action

insertWorkflow

void insertWorkflow(WorkflowJobBean workflow)
                    throws StoreException
Inserts the given workflow into the store

Parameters:
workflow - workflow bean.
Throws:
StoreException

getWorkflow

WorkflowJobBean getWorkflow(java.lang.String id,
                            boolean locking)
                            throws StoreException
Load the Workflow with given id to the WorkflowBean. Load the Process Instance also to the bean. Lock the Workflow if locking option is given.

Parameters:
id - Workflow ID.
locking - flag to lock the job.
Returns:
WorkflowBean Workflow bean.
Throws:
StoreException - If the job cannot be laoded.

getWorkflowInfo

WorkflowJobBean getWorkflowInfo(java.lang.String id)
                                throws StoreException
Load the Workflow Info. Load the List of actions of the workflow also. process instance is not loaded.

Parameters:
id - Workflow ID.
Returns:
Workflow bean.
Throws:
StoreException

getWorkflowIdForExternalId

java.lang.String getWorkflowIdForExternalId(java.lang.String extId)
                                            throws StoreException
Get the Workflow ID that belongs to the given external ID.

Parameters:
extId - External ID.
Returns:
Workflow ID.
Throws:
StoreException - If there are no jobs with given external id.

updateWorkflow

void updateWorkflow(WorkflowJobBean workflow)
                    throws StoreException
Update the data from the given WorkflowBean to Store.

Parameters:
workflow - Workflow bean to be updated.
Throws:
StoreException - if the bean cannot be updated.

getWorkflowCountWithStatusInLastNSeconds

int getWorkflowCountWithStatusInLastNSeconds(java.lang.String status,
                                             int secs)
                                             throws StoreException
Get the number of Workflows with the given status which was modified in given time limit.

Parameters:
status - Workflow Status.
secs - No. of seconds within which the workflow got modified.
Returns:
number of Workflows modified within given time with given status.
Throws:
StoreException

                             boolean locking)
                             throws StoreException
Load the action record with the given id to bean. Lock the action if locking option is given.

Parameters:
id - Action ID.
locking - flag to lock the action.
Returns:
Action bean.
Throws:
StoreException - if the action with given id is not present.

getActionsForWorkflow

java.util.List<WorkflowActionBean> getActionsForWorkflow(java.lang.String id,
                                                         boolean locking)
                                                         throws StoreException
Load all the actions for the given Workflow id.

Parameters:
id - Workflow ID.
locking - flag to lock the actions.
Returns:
List of action beans.
Throws:
StoreException - if there is an error while loading the actions.

getPendingActions

java.util.List<WorkflowActionBean> getPendingActions(long minimumPendingAgeSecs)
                                                     throws StoreException
Load the actions that are pending for more than given time.

Parameters:
minimumPendingAgeSecs - minimum pending age in seconds.
Returns:
list of action beans.
Throws:
StoreException - if there is an error while loading the actions.

getRunningActions

java.util.List<WorkflowActionBean> getRunningActions(long checkAgeSecs)
                                                     throws StoreException
Load running actions which were last checked before the specified time.

Parameters:
checkAgeSecs - the check age in seconds.
Returns:
A list of running actions which were last checked after now - checkAgeSecs.
Throws:
StoreException

getWorkflowsInfo

WorkflowsInfo getWorkflowsInfo(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> filter,
                               int start,
                               int len)
                               throws StoreException
Load the Workflows according to the given filter information.

Parameters:
filter - Can be name, status, user, group and combination of these.
start - returned result set offset.
len - returned result set rows.
Returns:
List of Workflows Satisfying the given filter.
Throws:
StoreException - thrown if the workflow result could not be queried.
